StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [CreateTempTable]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NumberOfRows int AS /* BK: This is a port from legacy - needed for Program Management */ SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @i int SET @i = 1
CREATE TABLE #TEMP_TABLE (TEMP_ID INT)
WHILE @i <= @NumberOfRows BEGIN INSERT INTO #TEMP_TABLE (TEMP_ID) VALUES (@i) SET @i = @i + 1 END
--- RETURN THE RESULT SET SELECT TEMP_ID FROM #TEMP_TABLE
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #TEMP_TABLE SET NOCOUNT OFF
